definition: body covering of a living animal, to attack and bombard with or as if with missiles
details:
noun
- body covering of a living animal
= example: body covering of a living animal
= synonyms: hide
- the dressed hairy coat of a mammal
= example: the dressed hairy coat of a mammal
= synonyms: fur
verb
- to attack and bombard with or as if with missiles
= example: to attack and bombard with or as if with missiles
= synonyms: pepper
- to cast, hurl, or throw repeatedly with some missile
= example: to cast, hurl, or throw repeatedly with some missile
= synonyms: bombard
- to rain heavily
= example: to rain heavily
= synonyms: stream
